short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creates additional option for approve if your are not happy about the code

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sometimes you must to approve a pull request but you look at the code and you feel sad about it. The idea comes from: https://x.com/sebjvidal/status/1839694113249096052. 

Github Unhappy Approve is Chrome Extension for adding an option in approve page.
